categoryDefinition: This diverse group includes companies that focus on specific niches of employee wellbeing or provide high-value consulting services, rather than offering an all-in-one platform. It includes EAP providers, wellness specialists, and brokers who create bespoke plans.

competitors.name: Hellas EAP
competitors.description: As Greece's first dedicated Employee Assistance Program (EAP) provider, Hellas EAP offers deep local expertise. Their services include a 24/7 support line, counseling, leadership consultation, and crisis management.

competitors.name: Howden Greece
competitors.description: A specialist insurance and reinsurance broker that provides expert consulting on employee benefits. They design customized wellbeing plans by analyzing company culture, market data, and regulatory requirements.

competitors.name: MantraCare
competitors.description: A comprehensive employee wellness platform with a strong presence in Greece. It offers an integrated approach, combining EAP with preventive healthcare, chronic condition management, and a multi-language support system.
